titleStmt.title: A true divrnall: or A continued relation of Irish occurences, from the 12. of Febr. to the 8. of March. Printed after a copy that was sent from Mr. William Bladen of Dublin, to his sonne resident here in London: shewing what overthrowes was given to the rebells, and what good successe the Protestant party had; with a relation of the late reliefe of Trohedagh.
titleStmt.author: Bladen, W. (William)

titleStmt.title: A true divrnall: or A continued relation of Irish occurences, from the 12. of Febr. to the 8. of March. Printed after a copy that was sent from Mr. William Bladen of Dublin, to his sonne resident here in London: shewing what overthrowes was given to the rebells, and what good successe the Protestant party had; with a relation of the late reliefe of Trohedagh.
titleStmt.author: Bladen, W. (William)

publicationStmt.publisher: for William Bladen, and are to be sold by Francis Couls ...,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: William Bladen and dated Dublin: March. 8 1641.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
